title: Muggers kill power division officer on Tongi flyover
body: An officer of the Power Division was stabbed to death, allegedly by a group of muggers, on the Tongi flyover in Gazipur early Saturday. The victim is Siddiqur Rahman, 58, a store officer at the power division office in Keraniganj. Quoting local people, Tongi East police station sub-inspector Mehedi Hasan said that Siddiqur, on his way to the office, was climbing the flyover’s staircase when a group of muggers intercepted him. They attempted to snatch his money and mobile phone and the muggers stabbed him with a sharp weapon when he tried to resist, he said, and added that the victim died on the spot. On information, the police recovered the body and sent it to Shaheed Tajuddin Ahmad Medical College Hospital morgue for autopsy, he said. Gazipur Metropolitan Police’s assistant commissioner Mahidul Hasan said that the police were trying to identify and arrest the muggers.
